about_the_game:
Falling stars are celestial objects that descend from the celestial dome,The earliest written records can be traced back to the twelfth year of the Jianxing era.According to literature,'On that night, the sun suddenly fell from the sky, the sky was burning with flames, and the night was illuminated as bright as day. The sun leaped thousands of miles, its grandeur was terrifying.Finally, the sun sank beyond the western horizon, its exact location lost to sight.Later, some people said that it was not the sun, but a star from the sky that fell, so people called it the fallen star.'

Is the dazzling yet frightful meteor a sign of good luck or a punishment from the divine?

The vicissitudes of life, the passage of time, and now it is the year 2024.The previously barren land has now flourished with development.Freshmen have embarked on their new journey in college, and the wheels of destiny have begun to turn silently. The fates of the young men(you) and women are intertwined in ways that cannot be seen.

Let's use existence and freedom as stakes, block everything, and explore the ancient legends of the Fallen Star Village, digging out the truth buried in the long river of history.

A series of peculiar changes are occurring successively?

The atmosphere on the university campus was filled with joy and cheerful sounds, however, an indescribable sense of unease started to loom over the area.

Shh—Please be quiet and refrain from speaking.

The individuals wandering on the campus are no longer familiar to you!

They have lost themselves, and now they should perhaps be referred to as 'the undead'.

It is now imperative that you exercise utmost caution while living in the ruins, searching for even the smallest slivers of hope for survival. Your task is to remain alert, composed, and ready to seize any opportunity that presents itself, in order to increase your chances of survival.

Survival is of utmost importance! Let us build a sanctuary.

Continual aimless wandering and concealing oneself may result in mental breakdown!

Fortunately, the campus of the university is expansive and well-equipped, providing ample opportunities for scavenging or pursuing hobbies such as farming, fishing, or collecting supplies.Make use of every available resource to ensure your survival.

Next, in a spacious and robust classroom, construct your own shelter for surviving a doomsday scenario and create a variety of necessary survival amenities.

This will be your final sanctuary with the girls in this apocalyptic world.

Please be cautious! The undead has been attracted to this location.

It has been observed that under specific conditions or after a certain period of time, the undead individuals tend to gather together.

They become frenzied and bloodthirsty, an endless tide of undead creatures that will infiltrate every nook and cranny, hunting down the survivors from all corners.

And the harsh alarm sound will become the signal for their attack!

Your refuge shall become a target of the Undead tide, please make full preparations, stockpile supplies, upgrade the sanctuary, and build defense facilities.

Join forces with the maidens in battle and devote all your efforts to safeguarding their safety,and never allow any lapses in attention or carelessness to result in losing track of their

whereabouts!

Cozy evenings spent together.The genuine elements of harem romance

Emotions can always withstand various hardships in the end times, while ensuring one's survival, don't forget to communicate with the seven girls and relieve loneliness.

You always feel a faint gaze lingering on you, and it might not just be seven girls. Take a closer look and you'll find that the world is perhaps more fascinating than what you see.

As the communication with the girls deepens, they will gradually open up and talk about their past (with the assurance that there are no elements that are disgusting!)

The increasing intensity of emotions will give rise to intriguing and distinctive narratives between the two of you (Sweet and intense love affair!)

As you venture out to gather supplies,you might receive text messages or phone calls from the girl, which could make for an interesting story. [If you choose not to reply to the message or hang up the call, there will be an equally exciting alternative ending]

Late at night may be the time when human emotions are the most fragile, as the fear of survival intrudes upon the thoughts of young ladies, making it difficult for them to fall asleep alone. As a gentleman, how could one stand idly by and watch beautiful young ladies suffer from distress?

Try inviting the young lady to spend the night together. Under the high pressure of the apocalypse, emotions are always the strongest support. Perhaps some delightful little interactions will quietly happen when the night is deep and quiet~

Is a splendid vow the expectation harbored in the hearts of young ladies?

In the realm of love, actions consistently carry more weight than words. When feelings of affection reach their zenith, and you happen to acquire the [Eternal Ring], a token of everlasting bond, during your explorations, you may engage in a sacred vow ceremony with the heroines.

Even amidst the arduous conditions of an alternate realm, this heartfelt commitment will serve as the purest emotional tie between you and the heroines. No matter the circumstances—be it favorable or adverse, life or death—you will cling to each other, never to part, until the very end of the world.

This steadfast vow will constitute the most enchanting chapter in the saga of love shared between you both.

御影蓝那

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Has no resistance to cute things.

  • Has a natural aversion to unfamiliar things.

    She has her own unique set of behavioral principles, especially when it comes to promises made to friends. She will strive to fulfill what she has set her mind to, and this somewhat stubborn personality might be related to her past.

沐筱娅

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Cheerful, lively, enthusiastic, and the embodiment of positive energy.

  • Culturally, artistically, and athletically talented in all aspects.

    Regardless of her appearance or talents, she is a well-rounded individual, a true "Hexagonal Warrior", and definitely a talent that any university would love to recruit. Yet, she chose to come to Luoxing University. What kind of unknown story lies behind this decision?

苏兮

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Independent, calm, and gentle.

  • Exceptional musical talent.

    Her gentle and graceful demeanor often makes people around her mistakenly think she comes from a noble family, but in fact, she was raised by her single mother. She loves the unique melody of the piano, and perhaps has exceptional talent in it, as her self-taught piano skills are already comparable to those of professionals. Behind her independence, there is also a vulnerable side that is worthy of sympathy.

奈奈

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Lively, attentive, with a hint of tsundere.

  • Approachable young lady.

    She has loved swimming since childhood and has developed an enviable set of perfect abdominal muscles. She and Su Xi have been close friends since they were young. According to Su Xi, she was a bit spoiled and willful when they were kids, but now she has become someone who respects everyone equally. Who changed her? Why is there an empty space in her heart? She has been trying to remember, never giving up.

凌薇

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Cold, dignified, and standoffish.

  • Mature thinking beyond her age, a reliable older sister.

    She has been studying abroad for a long time, and there is always an aura of aloofness around her that keeps people at a distance, as if she has adopted this defensive posture to make others give up easily. Perhaps due to family influence, her logical thinking is very clear and rigorous, and she handles things in an orderly manner. Her horizons and thinking have transcended age limitations. Now she has chosen to return to China to attend university, perhaps with other plans in mind?

梦瑶

  • A first-year student in the Art Department of Luoxing University

  • Innocent and cute, with a hint of mischievousness, enjoys being pampered.

  • An angel dancing with a demon.

    She grew up being pampered by her loved ones and friends, and quickly learned to use her innocent and cute charm to become the center of attention. Although she has a slight tendency to be self-centered, she surprisingly understands the importance of balance, which has earned her high praise from those around her. Will she continue to live in the limelight of praise in the future? However, what kind of interesting soul lies hidden behind her perfect mask?

妗乐莳

  • Disjointed time and space, unknown origin.

  • Cool, calm, and imbued with a scholarly aura.

  • A hidden obsession.

    The young girl encountered in a different time and space seems to have wandered here by mistake while pursuing something. Her choice of words often gives people the feeling of stepping into a historical drama. She is well-read in poetry and proficient in the art of war, and her relatively conservative mindset often makes her blush when interacting with you. "lecher" seems to have become her catchphrase.

[Expansive Map Scenarios] Explore over hundreds of maps.

[Engaging Storyline] Game text content exceeding 500,000 words.

[Diverse Heroines] Over seven charming and distinct heroines to pursue.

[No Choice Paralysis] Pursue all heroines simultaneously without parallel route restrictions.

[Rich Interactive Events] Over a hundred various interactive events with the heroines.

[Colorful Wardrobe] Each heroine has at least seven additional outfits to change into.

[Abundant Item Variety] Collect over hundreds of various items, a delight for collectors.

[Exquisite Illustrations and CGs] All character illustrations and CGs will be in dynamic form.

[Comprehensive Nurturing System] Amidst the intense storyline progression, you can also experience SLG elements of simulation management within the shelter. In this alternate space, the seven heroines of the shelter cannot survive independently without you. Therefore, players must constantly monitor their mood, mental stability (SAN value), hunger, affection, and other key statuses.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING: This game contains partial nudity.
All characters that appear in the game have attained adulthood.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
